com.example.atheneum.viewmodels.FirebaseRefUtils

Class DatabaseWriteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.atheneum.viewmodels.FirebaseRefUtils.DatabaseWriteHelper

  • public class DatabaseWriteHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to abstract writes to the database. Abstracting writes to the database in a central hides information about the database from the views and makes it easier to write multi-path updates correctly since multi-path updates can touch multiple paths within the database.

    This class should be updated whenever new actions on the database are added.
